title: I Want To Live A Normal Life, But I’m An SSS-Class Hunter - Novel Updates
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Demon Lord   Female Protagonist   Hunters   Protagonist Strong from the Start
author: 이수림
description:
I was forced to become the Demon King and almost destroyed the world. I thought it was all over when I came back to my senses and gave my life to the warrior. 

Reborn again? And with the great power as it is.

'If I use this power, I can rule the world.’

But I want to live a normal life!

The problem is that there are dungeons and monsters in this modern society.

It is said that every Korean citizen should take an ability test. 

'Will my power be revealed?'

And that actually happened.txt 

[Class: SSS∞ (Infinite) class] 

People all over the world know that I’m the best hunter! On top of that.

'I will make this world mine!'

In the midst of all sorts of plots by villains.

'All I can give you is money.'

Suddenly, a very famous rich dad appeared

'Marry me!!!' 

(Self-proclaimed) The world's best hot guy sticks to me.

'Will you go out with me?'

The world's most beautiful prince is approaching

'May I call you master?'

Even the warrior who killed me in my previous life appears!>
